PluginInfo Attributes describe the plugin to vvvv.

^code:
[PluginInfo(Name = "Template",
            Category = "Value",
            Help = "A simple Template",
            Tags = "simple, basic",
            Author = "vvvv group",
            AutoEvaluate = false)]^

Within the () brackets in the statement above there is a comma seperated list of properties. Only the __Name__ and __Category__ property are mandatory, all others are optional. 

All available properties ((/pluginspecs/html/AllMembers_T_VVVV_PluginInterfaces_V2_INodeInfo.htm|are listed here)).
